a traits class instance, can be omitted

memberdef.definition: OutputIterator CGAL::Polygon_mesh_slicer< TriangleMesh, Traits, VertexPointMap, AABBTree, UseParallelPlaneOptimization >::operator()
memberdef.name: operator()

briefdescription.para: Constructs the intersecting polylines of plane with the input triangulated surface mesh.

parameterdescription.para: an output iterator accepting polylines. A polyline is provided as std::vector<Traits::Point_3>. A polyline is closed if its first and last point are identical.
the plane to intersect the triangulated surface mesh with

memberdef.definition: CGAL::Polygon_mesh_slicer< TriangleMesh, Traits, VertexPointMap, AABBTree, UseParallelPlaneOptimization >::~Polygon_mesh_slicer
memberdef.name: ~Polygon_mesh_slicer

briefdescription.para: Function object that computes the intersection of a plane with a triangulated surface mesh.

detaileddescription.para:
TriangleMesh
a triangulated surface mesh, model of FaceGraph and HalfedgeListGraph
Traits
a model of AABBGeomTraits
VertexPointMap
a model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<TriangleMesh>::vertex_descriptor as key and Traits::Point_3 as value type. The default is typename boost::property_map< TriangleMesh, vertex_point_t>::type.
AABBTree
must be an instantiation of CGAL::AABB_tree able to handle the edges of TriangleMesh, having its edge_descriptor as primitive id. The default is CGAL::AABB_tree<CGAL::AABB_traits< Traits, CGAL::AABB_halfedge_graph_segment_primitive<TriangleMesh> > >
UseParallelPlaneOptimization
if true, the code will use specific predicates and constructions in case the functor is called with a plane orthogonal to a frame axis, the non-null coefficient being 1 or -1. The default is true.
The implemenation of this class depends on the package 3D Fast Intersection and Distance Computation.
